All Implemented Interfaces:
jopt.csp.variable.CspConstraint, GraphConstraint, NumConstants, PostableConstraint, VariableChangeSource
public class BooleanAndConstraint
extends ThreeVarConstraint

Constraint that restricts a BoolExpr to be the AND of two other BoolExpr

Constructor Detail

BooleanAndConstraint

public BooleanAndConstraint(BoolExpr x,
                            BoolExpr y,
                            boolean notY,
                            BoolExpr z)
Constrains z to be x AND y. If notY is true, then z is constrained to be x AND !y.

Parameters:
x - boolean expression to include in the AND expression
y - boolean expression to include in the AND expression
notY - boolean representing whether to use the original or opposite value of y
z - boolean expression to represent the value of the AND expression
